subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez homered, drove in five runs and got into a shouting match with a teammate Thursday night as the Boston Red Sox beat the visiting Tampa Bay Rays, 7-1, in a game that included a benches-clearing brawl.
snippet: Manny Ramírez homered, drove in five runs and got into a shouting match with a teammate Thursday night as the Boston Red Sox beat the visiting Tampa Bay Rays, 7-1, in a game that included a benches-clearing brawl.
